---
title: "Install Linux Libraries"
output: html_notebook
---

```{bash}
## linux libraries

## ssl
sudo apt-get -y install libcurl4-openssl-dev openssl libssl-dev openssh-client

## tex
sudo apt-get -y install texlive texlive-latex-extra libxml2-dev texinfo texlive-bibtex-extra texlive-fonts-extra texlive-xetex

## git
sudo apt-get install -y git

## databases
sudo apt-get install -y unixodbc unixodbc-dev odbc-postgresql libmysqlclient-dev tdsodbc

## email
sudo apt-get install -y sendmail

## RRD
sudo apt-get install -y librrds-perl rrdtool

## java [optional]
sudo apt-get install -y default-jdk

## build [optional]
sudo apt-get install -y build-essential

## other [optional]
sudo apt-get install -y jags
sudo apt-get install -y libatlas3-base
sudo apt-get install -y libboost-all-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libcairo2
sudo apt-get install -y libcairo2-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libfftw3-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libgdal1-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libgraphviz-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libgsl-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libnetcdf-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libprocps4-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libproj-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libprotoc-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libquantlib0-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libsasl2-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libxt-dev
sudo apt-get install -y libxt6
sudo apt-get install -y lsb-release
sudo apt-get install -y protobuf-compiler
```
